name: garr-shib2ds
author: GARR
summary: A Shibboleth2 puppet module that installs Shibboleth DS on EL/Debian platforms

parameters.name: name
parameters.doc: The name of the new file to be created

parameters.name: url
parameters.doc: The file's URL to be downloaded

parameters.name: extract
parameters.doc: A flag indicating whether the files should be extracted after download or not

parameters.name: execute_command
parameters.doc: An array of commands to be executed after download

properties.name: ensure
properties.doc: Whether the resource is in sync or not.

types.name: download_file
types.doc: A new type of resource that downloads a file from an URL and put it on one on the system, existing or not.

parameters.name: name
parameters.doc: The name of the resource

parameters.name: repository_type
parameters.doc: The type of repository to be added. Possible values are: 'deb', 'deb-src'. Default value is 'deb'.

parameters.name: repository_url
parameters.doc: The URL of the repository

parameters.name: repository_targets
parameters.doc: The targets of the repository. Default value is 'main'

parameters.name: sources_file
parameters.doc: The file where the repository should be added in APT sources. Default value is 'sources.list'

parameters.name: key_name
parameters.doc: The name of the public key to be trusted for the repository.

parameters.name: key_file
parameters.doc: The public key to be trusted for the repository.

properties.name: ensure
properties.doc: Whether the resource is in sync or not.

types.name: apt_repository
types.doc: Add an apt repository and eventually download and trust the public key

parameters.name: name
parameters.doc: The name of the metadata file to be created

parameters.name: metadata_idp
parameters.doc: The metadata URLs for IdP metadata

parameters.name: metadata_sp
parameters.doc: The metadata URLs for SP metadata

parameters.name: filecontent
parameters.doc: The content of the metadata file to be created

properties.name: ensure
properties.doc: Whether the resource is in sync or not.

parameters.name: name
parameters.doc: The name of the action

parameters.name: sourcedir
parameters.doc: Path where the Shibboleth IdP sources are extracted.

parameters.name: dsfqdn
parameters.doc: The Shibboleth DS's FQDN

parameters.name: installdir
parameters.doc: The Shibboleth DS installation directory

parameters.name: javahome
parameters.doc: The Java home

parameters.name: tomcathome
parameters.doc: The Tomcat installation directory

parameters.name: curtomcat
parameters.doc: The current Tomcat version

types.name: shibbolethds_install
types.doc: Install Shibboleth DS sources downloaded from Internet2 site
